message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I believe it's a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $750000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product. This would still be a good deal for you, as it's significantly more than what you'd get if you sold it to John.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $725000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you and the potential benefits you'll gain from owning it.
